about_the_game:
It is an additional content that can be used as a rare zebra, appaloosa pattern, redhead, cheetah pattern, okapi pattern for the coat color of juveniles born from the breeding mares by using it for the breeding mares that are under conception in April 1.

▼ How to use
If you have a fertile breeding horse on your farm, including overseas, on April 1st, you will be asked if you want to use a coat color directory.

If you select one of the coat colors in the coat color directory and then select a breeding mares with a conception, the coat color of juveniles born from the breeding mares will be changed to those selected for that year.

▼Caution
The five color choices available on this DLC are different from those available as rewards for online matches.

The five types of coat color that can be selected with this DLC can be used any number of times as long as DLC is enabled.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
